content: What planet are our Politicians living on? Do they (as rich and isolated as they are) think they can send us (Military) off to war or even in the normal course of military duties get damaged and expect us TO PAY FOR IT? I say it's high time that the folks who have bled or paid the ultimate sacrifice be heard loud and clear. We are mad as hell and want take this much longer!! How many of them have endured what we have and still do? I think that we should gear them up and send them to the "Sandbox" for 3 or 4 tours. Maybe they would then understand. Doubtful but maybe. I have a 80% disability and am extremely limited on what kind of work I can do but do they care. H%%l NO!!
